name: spook 'em all
description:
Be a weird creature! Spook your neighbours! Accidentally start a new tradition!!! 
WASD to move, SPACE to jump. Listen to the conversations and dress your character accordingly.

Small game made for the Summer Slow Jam June 2022: Character Creator with Unintended Consequences as the creative theme. I had a vague idea of what I wanted to do before starting the jam and did not have much time to adapt it to the creative theme once it was announced but it is what it is, so there you have a lazy reimagining of the origins of Halloween! I will *probably* add SFX and music some day.

ASSETS, FONTS AND OTHER RESOURCES I USED:

Palutte by Sophie Houlden
Medieval Town Assets by EmacEArt
Medieval Town Exteriors by Lylek Games
Modular Fantasy Character by asoliddev
